LanguageData.FTC_SandBag1x2c.label: stack sandbag (1x2)
LanguageData.FTC_SandBag1x2c.description: A stockpile of sandbags, can provide a tough cover or be used as decoration in the colony.

LanguageData.FTC_PowerConduit.label: facility conduit
LanguageData.FTC_PowerConduit.description: A bundle of electrical cables for moving power around inside fortifications. it's tough and lay beneath the floor so it also looks fine to people.
